00043 
00044 ArrOfDouble Terme_Source_Canal_perio_VDF_P0::source_convection_diffusion(double debit_e) const
00045 {
00046 // Compute heat_flux:
00047   double heat_flux = compute_heat_flux();
00048 
00049   const Zone_VF& zone_vf = ref_cast(Zone_VF,equation().zone_dis().valeur());
00050   const double& volume = zone_vf.zone().volume_total();
00051   int size = zone_vf.nb_elem();
00052   ArrOfDouble s(size);
00053   if (velocity_weighting_) //!< It seems this algorithm do not imply dT/dt -> 0
00054     {
00055       Cerr << "Option 'velocity_weighting' of source term 'canal_perio' in '" << equation().que_suis_je() << "' is not supported!!" << finl;
00056       Cerr << "Contact TRUST support" << finl;
00057       exit();
00058     }
00059   else
00060     {
00061 // Compute source term with
00062 // Source = -Sum(imposed_heat_flux)/Volume
00063 // Loop on the faces
00064       for (int num_elem = 0; num_elem < size; num_elem++)
00065         s(num_elem) = -heat_flux/volume;
00066     }
00067   return s;
00068 }
00069 
00070 DoubleTab& Terme_Source_Canal_perio_VDF_P0::ajouter(DoubleTab& resu) const
00071 {
00072   const Zone_VF& zone_VF = la_zone_VDF.valeur();
00073   const DoubleVect& volumes = zone_VF.volumes();
00074   ArrOfDouble s(source());
00075 
00076 // Boucle sur les elements internes
00077   int nb_elem = zone_VF.nb_elem();
00078   for (int num_elem = 0; num_elem < nb_elem; num_elem++)
00079     {
00080       double vol = volumes(num_elem);
00081       resu(num_elem)+= s(num_elem)*vol;
00082     }
00083 
00084   return resu;
00085 }
